name: Postman to OpenAPI
description:
# Getting started

The easiest way to get started with this collection is to click the fork button to fork this collection to your own workspace and use Postman to send requests.

# Usage

1. [Generate a Postman API key](https://learning.postman.com/docs/developer/intro-api/)

2. Fetch the ID of the Collection you wish to convert. This can be found by selecting the Collection in Postman, navigating to the right-hand sidebar, clicking the `Info` tab (symbolized by the `i` icon), and copying the ID.

3. Update the `Current value` for the associated [collection variables](https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/variables/#defining-collection-variables) in this collection  with the Postman API key and Collection ID you just retrieved.

4. Run the [Generate an OpenAPI Schema](https://www.postman.com/postman/workspace/405e0480-49cf-463b-8052-6c0d05a8e8f3/request/5922408-3b169388-c199-43d0-8247-721b312c0da4) request. In the response pane, click `Visualize`.

5. Make use of your freshly converted schema!
